title: Foundations of Behavior Intervention Technology Design Considering Cultural Context

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Targeting pre-service/in-service science teachers, conducting smartphone-based learning in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain a three-step or more behavioral intervention design process that reflects cultural differences.
Learners can analyze cultural characteristics of small groups and propose intervention strategy applications.
Learners can design at least one behavioral intervention content suitable for smartphone-based self-directed learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
